channel.title: My client cant connect to my server
channel.description:
Hi ,ppl.,
i have a problem, i made new client but when i strated my server i cant connect to it because i set to be in the lient log-in is only username and password and in the client.java [code] setserver("", "43594");[/code] ...bla-bla... [code]return new Socket(InetAddress.getByName("the-sparta.no-ip.org"), i);[/code] please help me

item.title: My client cant connect to my server

item.description:
@Swift_Sk wrote:

so its will looks:

setserver(“the-sparta.no-ip.org”, “43594”);

???
